body:
Halfling Parents
d%Result
01—70Both parents living.
71—80Only your father is alive.
81—90Only your mother is alive.
91—100Both of your parents are dead. You gain access to the Orphaned social trait.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Background Generator/Step 1-Homeland/Family/and Childhood/Halfling/Halfling Parents
name: Halfling Parents
